original_title: Digamadulla District final results: NPP secures 4 more seats
original_body_lines: The Election Commission of Sri Lanka has released the final results of the Digamadulla District in the 2024 General Election with the National People’s Power (NPP) polling more than 40% of the total votes in the district.
NPP has polled 146,313 votes to win the district while the SLMC is second with 46,899 votes (12.92%).
The NPP has secured 4 seats in the district while the SLMC has won 1 seat in the district.
